title: Add a second page that lists words related to the letter A

requirements.text: Add a new page to the frontend that lists words related to the English alphabet letter “A”, and make it reachable from the existing A–Z alphabet page.

quotes: Now add one more page and list all the words related to a alphabet

acceptanceCriteria: The app has a second page (separate view) dedicated to “A” words.
From the main alphabet page, there is a clear navigation control (e.g., button/link) to open the “A words” page.
The “A words” page includes a visible page title (e.g., “Words that start with A”) and renders a list of A-related words in a clean, responsive layout.
The “A words” page includes an obvious way to return to the main A–Z page (e.g., Back link/button).

requirements.text: Populate the “A words” page with a static, curated list of English words that start with the letter “A” (no external API calls).

quotes: list all the words related to a alphabet

acceptanceCriteria: The words displayed on the “A words” page are all English words that begin with “A”.
The list contains enough entries to demonstrate scrolling on smaller screens (at least 25 words).
No network requests are required to display the list.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services or external databases.
nonGoals: Do not implement dictionary/thesaurus lookups or integrations with third-party APIs to fetch words.
Do not add authentication requirements or user accounts for viewing the words page.
Do not add per-letter pages for all letters (only implement the requested “A” words page).
